com.madrobot.ui.widgets

Class SVGImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • com.madrobot.ui.widgets.SVGImageView

  • public class SVGImageView
extends ImageView
    An ImageView that can also use SVG images as its source.

    The SVG image set is loaded asynchronously.
    Attributes

    Attribute Type Default Description
    svgResource integer -1 The SVG resource to be used. defined usually with @raw/svg_file
    svgZoomFactor integer 100 The factor by which the SVG should be zoomed. 100 indicates that the SVG will be rendered in its actual size, 200 means twice its size,50 means half its size and so on.

    Demo
    This demo uses the Giraffe.svg created by ryan lerch.

    Using the SVGImageView
            <com.madrobot.ui.widgets.SVGImageView
        android:id="@+id/image"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
  android:layout_height="wrap_content"
  app:svgZoomFactor="100" 
  app:svgResource="@raw/giraffe"
        android:background="#ff0000" />

    Author:
    elton.stephen.kent
    See Also:
    SVGFactory, SVG

        public void setSVGZoomFactor(int zoomFactor)
        Set the Zoom level for the loaded SVG Image.

        This is a Asynchronous call.

        Parameters:
        zoomFactor -
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the SVG image has not been set.
